name: promtie
description: Neatly dress up your native promises with simple but powerful utils.

scripts.test-cov: nyc ava test/spec --reporter=lcov && echo coverage report: coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.coverage: nyc ava test/spec && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
